metadata.inclusion:
-Press Func_Button 3 time in the motion sensor, Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second.
-If Inclusion Process is successful, Green LED will turn off.
metadata.exclusion:
-Press Func_Button 3 times quickly.
-If Exclusion Process is successful, Green LED is Blinking 6 times, then turn off.
metadata.reset:
-Long press Func_Button while installing batteries 
-Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted
-Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
